## Field.getSize() method

Returns the height and width of the field.

This should \*in general\* be the only place render\_ gets called from.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getSize(): Size;
```
**Returns:**

[Size](./blockly.utils_namespace.size_class.md)

Height and width.
